bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Managing Natural Disaster Impact on key electrical systems and installations in Petroleum and Chemical Facilities
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Managing Natural Disaster Impact on key electrical systems and installations in Petroleum and Chemical Facilities

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document provides recommendations and guidelines for managing natural disaster impact on key electrical facilities and systems in petroleum and chemical facilities in order to minimize economic damage by pre-assessment risk evaluation of electrical facilities, by identification of mitigation techniques and systems designs to minimize impact, and by outlining procedures for faster recovery of electrical systems after a natural disaster.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
